title: Create User Response Schema
description: Schema for a successful new user creation response from DummyAPI

id.description: The unique ID of the newly created user

firstName.description: First name of the created user

lastName.description: Last name of the created user

email.description: Email address of the created user

registerDate.description: Registration date of the user (ISO 8601 format)

updatedDate.description: Last updated date of the user (ISO 8601 format)
